He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists hes an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy the winner being the first to climb The Big One, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadnt counted on the competitive dads dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how its done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwals precious plant once a day while hes on holiday. Its all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbours gadgets while hes away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night but Mr Beans other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwals got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid wont shut as its too full of rubbish and by the time hes shut it, theyve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they wont notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - dont worry, well have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irmas brochure a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: At a funfair, Mr Bean wins a balloon for Teddy and ties it to him while he plays on the hook a duck. But hes so engrossed he doesnt notice his companion floating away! Soon Mr Bean is chasing Teddy as he glides and snags on various fairground rides. Will Mr Bean rescue Teddy before he floats away forever?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Eating too many sweets gives Bean a terrible toothache, and when all other attempts at curing it are exhausted, he reluctantly visits the dreaded dentist.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all roundbut then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by his hair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr Bean goes to watch his favorite TV show, he hears loud noises from the neighbors. He moves to the garden but he cannot escape the cacophony of trumpet drilling and crying babies. Bean starts thinking about revenge...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourists snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort win her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guys making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean meets an aristocratic old lady when he nearly runs over her lapdog with his mini. Hes thrilled to be invited for luncheon at her grand but strangely shabby mansion. Bean is determined to rise to the occasion. Hes so busy with matters of protocol he doesnt notice that the lady and her sinister butler arent quite what they seem

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a royal documentary, Mr. Bean decides to redecorate his room in Buckingham Palace styleresulting in hilarious wallpaper chaos.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean races his neighbor to grow a giant marrow, chasing prize money and a photo in the papersbut chaos and comedy ensue along the way.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Beans heart-throb Roxy is singing at the Palladium. With her record, poster, and T-shirt ready, hes determined to get her autograph no matter what.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean discovers he has a doppelganger: Mr. Pod. They wear the same clothes and look exactly alike. Unfortunately, it all goes wrong when his girlfriend, Irma, thinks that Mr. Pod is much more handsome than Bean.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Inspired by a wildlife documentary on TV, Mr. Bean dusts off his camera and treks deep into the countryside in search of the perfect wildlife photograph. After two fruitless days of being the hunter, he is somewhat miffed to find himself the hunted.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Whilst browsing the supermarket for lovely grub, Mr. Beans life-long pal, Teddy, is kidnapped. Bean tracks down the nasty men responsible and finds that Teddy is not their only captive. Mr. Bean rescues a hundred teddy bears once their ears are put through an industrial sewing machine.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - Titanic. Now he simply has to park the car. But when youre Mr Bean, nothings simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid? After destroying his landladys back garden, Mr. Bean tries out his hand-made contraption in the woods. He is overjoyed to discover a buried chest of gold doubloons. However, his happiness is soon thwarted by the arrival of two baddies, the police and a very angry Landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are looking forward to seeing a once-in-a-lifetime comet but it wont appear until 4am! He tries to stay up, but its useless he keeps dropping off. So instead, Mr Bean decides to go to bed and set an alarm yet he over-winds the clock and it breaks! With all the shops closed, his only option is to build his own complicated version to make sure he doesnt miss the comet

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctors outfit with stethoscope great Teddy - Ill give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking hes a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before hes found out?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is at the supermarket when he spots a cool fire engine ride but the security guard makes it clear its for little kids only. Not to be deterred, Mr Bean tries everything he can to distract the guard to have his go on the ride. When he finally does get his go, its not as good as he thought it would be, especially when a real fire engine has to be called to help Mr Bean!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean receives a delivery of a bunch of flowers for Mrs Wicket, but accidentally runs them over in the his car. He cant afford to replace them, so he decides to recreate the bunch by taking flowers one by one from anywhere he can - a vase in a cafe, a wedding bouquet, even from between the teeth of a tango dancer! But will he assemble the bunch and be back in time for Mrs Wicket?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets so engrossed playing with Mr Paliwals new drone that he doesnt notice a car thief stealing his car. They quickly jump into Mr Paliwals car and use the drone to track the stolen car to the thiefs warehouse hideout. Using the drone, they discover a criminal car-stealing operation but will they be able to outwit the car thieves using Mr Paliwals flying gadget?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Irma is dragging a very bored Mr Bean around a shopping centre when he spots a competition for Minty Mints pull your silliest face for a photo and win a cash prize! Mr Bean tries to queue but its too long - so he persuades Irma to visit a photo studio offering romantic photoshoots. Can Mr Bean get away with pulling funny faces and submit the photo to the Minty Mints people without Irma knowing?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Scrapper claws a rip in Teddy, Mr Bean rushes him to the Teddy hospital. As Teddy is being fixed, Mr Bean is rather taken with another Ted on sale in the shop. He decided to take Big Ted home with him once Teddy is fixed. But at home it seems as though Big Ted is freezing Teddy out, and after a particularly terrifying nightmare, Mr Bean realises he has to get rid of his new guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists hes an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy the winner being the first to climb The Big One, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadnt counted on the competitive dads dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Beans plan seems to be working until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irmas admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But its not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Beans home eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they arent very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught -where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers -even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to learn skateboarding but hurts himself on his first try. Meanwhile, Miss Wince is showing off her new mobility scooter at Mrs. Wickets. Bean is entranced. He could do wicked ollies with that! He absconds with a souped-up scooter and heads straight to the skate park, ready to challenge Bruiser Senior and Junior ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing -calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! He decides that the only way to restore peace in the household is to go out and find Scrapper himself -a journey that takes him deep into Londons sewers ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wickets nephew and Bruiser Jnr swapping football stickers and decides that he wants to fill up a sticker album too.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks hes just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden and goes rushing off to the Museum to have it valued.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the cars features. Undeterred, Bean professes his car superior. Declan issues a challenge -to see which car Irma will choose for her lift back to work. Bean decides his car may need a little pimping ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Boundcourse. She refuses to go, but then ropes in Bean to look after the child. The two start a competition to see who will win the trophy. Bean is a relentless competitor, winning everything up until the point things start getting out of hand ...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists hes an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy the winner being the first to climb The Big One, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadnt counted on the competitive dads dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how its done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwals precious plant once a day while hes on holiday. Its all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbours gadgets while hes away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night but Mr Beans other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwals got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid wont shut as its too full of rubbish and by the time hes shut it, theyve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they wont notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - dont worry, well have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irmas brochure a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: At a funfair, Mr Bean wins a balloon for Teddy and ties it to him while he plays on the hook a duck. But hes so engrossed he doesnt notice his companion floating away! Soon Mr Bean is chasing Teddy as he glides and snags on various fairground rides. Will Mr Bean rescue Teddy before he floats away forever?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage. / Mr Bean is stuck in a lift and starts to annoy the other passengers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drives his favourite Teddy to the cinema to see his favourite movie - Titanic. Now he simply has to park the car. But when youre Mr Bean, nothings simple. His ingenious efforts to find a parking space are persistently foiled. And the clock is ticking....

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A local archaeology dig inspires Bean to go in search of treasure. But why buy a metal detector when you can make one from lawnmower parts and a dustbin lid? After destroying his landladys back garden, Mr. Bean tries out his hand-made contraption in the woods. He is overjoyed to discover a buried chest of gold doubloons. However, his happiness is soon thwarted by the arrival of two baddies, the police and a very angry Landlady.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Theres easy money to be had in the art world and Mr. Bean is set on getting some of it. Once equipped with the right tools, he ventures into the countryside with a blank canvas in search of inspiration and comes home with a painting full of life. Literally.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean finds a fly in his room, its war. He needs weapons. Fly spray? A rolled-up magazine? These are only the start. In desperation, he enlists a mouldy doughnut, an encyclopaedia, an upside-down dustbin and a club-hammer. Finally, Bean becomes the first man in history to wage war on a fly... with a fridge.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A street mime artist takes a shine to Mr. Bean when the pair meet in the local park. Because Mr. Bean fails to pay him, the mime follows Mr. Bean to his apartment when hes not looking and breaks Mrs. Wickets water statue. But eventually, Mr. Bean manages to out-mime him!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is done with Teddy for a while and buys a parrot as a new friend. However, it turns out not to be easy to smuggle the parrot past his landlady and her cat Scrapper. And then he also has to get that bird to talk.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean goes to the beach to get a tan, but when the countryman arrives and prevents him from exposing to the sun, he is trying to find another place. And when the nimbus cloud covers the sun, he starts to desperately chase the beam of sunlight across London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Beans girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bears Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesnt like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourists snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort win her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes man overboard and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers theres only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majestys corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels and gets lost.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: How does Mr Bean know Teddy? Could he drive a mini at the age of ten? How long has he known Mrs Wicket? Bean takes us on a journey into the past to answer these and many more questions.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean cant bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when youve got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbours pet gerbil.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Eating too many sweets gives Bean a terrible toothache, and when all other attempts at curing it are exhausted, he reluctantly visits the dreaded dentist.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After (accidentally) rescuing a kitten from a tree Mr. Bean is set to have his picture in the newspaper! The photographer arrives with the grateful lady cat owner, the scene is set, smiles all roundbut then disaster strikes when Bean is continually upstaged by his hair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When Mr Bean goes to watch his favorite TV show, he hears loud noises from the neighbors. He moves to the garden but he cannot escape the cacophony of trumpet drilling and crying babies. Bean starts thinking about revenge...

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wickets beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesnt stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.desc: Mr Beans car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Beans plan seems to be working until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irmas admiration be punctured?

programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But its not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Beans home eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sees a new toy car in the window of the local department store Havlotts and decides he must have it. But on the way to the toy department Mr Bean gets stuck in the lift. He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they arent very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: From competitive eating to channeling his inner superhero, Mr. Beans bungling antics land him in all sorts of new sticky situations this season.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been stolen, Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wickets flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Christiane speaks with Icelands President Halla Tomasdottir and film director Pamela Hogan about the day 50 years ago when Icelands women went on strike to demand equal treatment, and the recent documentary telling the full story. programme.title: Vital Signs with Dr. Sanjay Gupta
programme.desc: We all know about animals that hibernate., the ones who press slow down or pause on nearly all metabolic functions like heart rate, blood flow, brain waves and body temperature, only to wake up as if nothing happened. Its something humans have never done, but what if they could? And what if the act of hibernation in humans could prolong lives or even save them? Dr. Sanjay Gupta takes a look at the scientists and researchers around the world studying what happens on a molecular level when animals hibernate and how these superpowers could one day be harnessed to fight cancer, help heart attack patients, treat depression, and even go to Mars.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: With 20% of Americans feeling lonely every day and the number of people without close friends having quadrupled over the past 35 years, Fareed Zakaria examines how the digital age is reshaping the very fabric of human connection.

programme.title: The Whole Story with Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: From the hurricane-afflicted Gulf Coast to the fire-ravaged mountains of California, communities are rebuilding in the face of disaster. CNNs Bill Weir explores the lessons learned and how we can adapt to a changing climate.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Christiane speaks with historian Thant Myint-U about his book Peacemaker, documenting the life of his grandfather U Thant, who as UN Secretary-General in the 1960s became a pivotal player in resolving wars around the world. Also on the show today: legendary filmmaker Werner Herzog speaks with Christiane about his recent non-fiction book, The Future of Truth, and Hari Sreenivasan speaks with novelist Arundhati Roy about her memoir, Mother Mary Comes to Me.

programme.title: Blueprint
programme.desc: Many people travel to Mongolia to disconnect, to escape into the vast wilderness and switch off. But for Mongolians, connectivity is everything. The country has 3.5 million people and 5 million active phone numbers. Everywhere you look in the capital city Ulaanbaatar, people are glued to their phones. A vibrant startup scene in the city is driving innovation and diversifying Mongolias economy beyond its mining roots, fueled by a young, ambitious, and entrepreneurial population. A new digital infrastructure is not only reshaping how people travel, live and shop here - but tackling some of the countrys biggest challenges: congestion, pollution and climate change. Innovations first cultivated in the city are taking root in remote corners of the country, where 30% of the population still live nomadic lifestyles. Forget Silicon Valley, this is the Silicon Steppe, where homegrown startups are powering Mongolias digital transformation.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Kun Isa vie Blueyn ja Bingon vaunuretkelle puistoon aikaisin aamulla, Bluey ei malta odottaa paastakseen rakkaalle kiipeilytelineelleen. Karsivallisyys joutuu kuitenkin koetukselle, kun Isa pysahtyy juttelemaan ystaviensa kanssa. Turhautunut Bluey keskeyttaa aikuisten keskustelut. Isa kaskee olemaan kohtelias, mutta vasta kun han huomaa Bingon leikkivan onnellisena, han tajuaa itsekin voivansa leikkia. Kun Isa seuraavan kerran pysahtyy juttelemaan bussipysakin lahelle, Bluey kehittaa Bingon kanssa oman bussileikkinsa ja houkuttelee Isankin mukaan. Kun kiire on ohi, Bluey rentoutuu ja nauttii matkasta.

programme.title: Tuuri
programme.desc: Kun aiti menee yksinaan kavelylle rannalle, Bluey juoksee hanet kiinni nayttakseen loytamaansa simpukankuorta. Teeskennellessaan merenneitoa, joka viimein sai jalat, han lahtee seikkailulle yksinaan, seuraten aidin jalanjalkia rantaviivaa pitkin. Matkalla han nakee surffaajan, arsyttavia lokkeja, parven rapuja, ikaantyneen meduusan seka ison ja hermostuneen pelikaanin. Saatuaan ensikosketuksen itsenaiseen elamaan, Bluey liittyy taas aidin seuraan ja kuuntelevat simpukankuorta ennen kuin kavelevat takaisin rantaa pitkin.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Esihistorian hamarissa luolapojat Finias ja Ferb keksivat ensin pyoran ja sitten ensimmaisen auton. Candace yrittaa tietenkin karayttaa veljiaan ja keksii vahingossa samalla tulen. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa alkukantaisen naattorin, jonka avulla han pyrkii viemaan asuinpaikan kehittyneemmilta lajitovereiltaan. / 1500-luvun Kiinassa pahamaineinen rosvopaallikko Tollokaani kaappaa hallitsijan tyttaren, prinsessa Isabellan. Finias, Ferb, Buford ja Baljeet lahtevat etsimaan nokkaelainmestari Perrya Jyrkimman Jyrkkyyden Jyrkkavuorelta pelastaakseen prinsessan.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun aiti tarjoutuu viettamaan koko paivan Candacen kanssa, tama on varma, etta paasee viimein karayttamaan veljensa mutta he eivat teekaan mitaan mielenkiintoista! Perry epailee tohtori Tollontyon liittyvan asiaan ja paatyy avustamaan perivihollistaan. / Candace pyytaa, etta Stacy hypnotisoi hanet, niin etta han voi nauttia treffeista Jeremyn kanssa miettimatta veljiensa karayttamista. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo menettaa muistinsa uusimman naattorinsa takia ja Norm kayttaa tilaisuutta hyvakseen teeskennellakseen hanen poikaansa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Irvingin ystava Albert ei usko tarinoita pojista, joten Albert kutsuu hanet katsomaan. Baljeet ja Buford matkivat poikia. Isabella auttaa Candacea varvaamaan tiimin poikien nalkittamiseksi.

programme.title: Suus sulav Eesti
programme.desc: Julud on traditsiooniline aeg traditsiooniliste juluroogadega. Hapukapsas, verivorstid, seapraad, piparkoogid. Aga tuleb valja, et vahemalt uhte neist hrgutistest Evelin Vigemast sugugi ei armasta. Kuidas Angelica olukorra lahendab? Pakume sel korral jululauale nii klassikat kui ka veidi ullatust. Saatejuht Angelica Udekull, reissoor Taavi Arus, montaaireissoor Vladlen Pobjarin, toimetaja Robert Krvits, produtsent Laura Krvits.

programme.title: Need vanad armastuskirjad
programme.desc: Romantiline ja samas ka traagiline lugu Eesti uhe armastatuima helilooja Raimond Valgre elust 1939.-1949. aastatel. Film raagib Valgre armastusest kauni blondi Alicei ja vene kaunitari Niina vastu. Jutustus sprusest ja reetmisest ning sellest, mis vib juhtuda inimestega, kes satuvad suurte poliitiliste muudatuste risttuultesse Eesti Vabariigi lpp, Teine maailmasda, nukogude korra ja stalinliku reiimi ulemvim. Sundmused kulmineeruvad aastavahetusel 1949/50 restoranis Gloria. Reissoor Mati Pldre, peaosas Rain Simmul, teistes rollides Liis Tappo, lle Kaljuste, Kart Tomingas, Marika Korolev, Marina Levtova, Ago-Endrik Kerge, Tnu Kilgas, Andres Lepik, Ly Tedre, Sulev Teppart, Guido Kangur, Jaan Rekkor jt. Eesti Telefilm, Freyja Film, Lege Artis Film ja Eesti Moedisain 1992. Tana on Rain Simmulil 60. sunnipaev. Palju nne!

programme.title: Hyacinth Bucket: juluvana kuub
programme.desc: Nagu ikka, uritab Hyacinth muljet avaldada ja kutsub peenele julupeole Richardi ulemuse koos abikaasaga. Kaua kannatanud Richardit tabab kerge nrkusehoog ja nii peab Hyacinth uksi hoolitsema, et kik laheks nagu plaanitult - ja kik lahebki nii, nagu alati.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Saaremaal on zoo
programme.desc: Suvi on labi, aga too ei ole kaugeltki lppenud. Risto raagib loomaaia kujundamisest ja Mirge vahetab Kuressaare poodides muugil olevad vutimunad uute vastu. Surikaadid ja marmosetid saavad maiustamiseks tukusid. Kulmemate ilmade saabudes tehakse ettevalmistusi talveks ja eksootilised linnud kolitakse vastvalminud Austraalia lindude majja.

programme.title: Topelt rm
programme.desc: Kelli ja Keiti on sunnist saati uhte jalga astunud, nad tunnevad juba poolelt snalt, mida teine arvab, soovib ning tunneb. Nad on uhemunarakukaksikud, kes arst-residentidena aitavad Tartu likooli kliinikumi sunnitusosakonnas uutel ilmakodanikel oma esimesi hingetmbeid teha.

programme.title: Suus sulav Eesti
programme.desc: Tippkokk Angelica Udekull valmistab julupuhadeks piduliku htusoogi. Tegemist on aga nii palju, et talle tulevad appi naitlejad Mari ja Mikk Jurjens, Sepo Seemann oma tipptennisistist poja Johannesega ja arhitekt Raul Vaiksoo, kelle ulesandeks saab ainulaadse piparkoogimaja tegemine. Too ei lahe ilma naeru, muusika ja viperusteta. Saatejuht Angelica Udekull, reissoor Marek Miil, toimetaja Robert Krvits, produtsent Laura Krvits.

programme.title: Julutunneli laulud
programme.desc: Heategevussaade Julutunnel toetas 2024. aasta julupuhadel Hille Tanavsuu Vahiravifondi Kingitud elu. Esinesid Tnis Magi, Elina Nechayeva, Lenna, Tahe-Lee Liiv, segakoor Vox Populi jt. Reissoor Rait Roland Veskemaa, produtsent Margus Saar.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Osooni meretagused julud Prangli ja Aksi saarel. Legendi jargi olevat Prangli olnud hea pelgupaik mereroovlitele, kes peitsid end paksus kuusemetsas. Et pahadest kulalistest lahti saada, pletati mets maha ja asemele kasvas mannik. Mereroovlite varandus on siiani leidmata, kull aga on pranglilaste julupuuks mand. Prangli kulje all asuva tillukese Aksi saare tegid kuulsaks vagevad hulgekutid. Mis elu elavad tana kaks vaikest saart Tallinna kulje all? Autorid Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite. Reissoor Keiti Valiste, operaator Madis Reimund, helireissoor Taisto Uuslail, toimetaja-produtsent ie Arusoo.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: Maahommiku pere veedab julud Atla misas. Misaprouaga koos kupsetatakse piparkooke; meistrimehe abiga valmib suur ja uhke julukroon; sellid toimetavad koos misaharraga misakoogis ja jululhnalist avastamist on veelgi. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello, vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, reissoor Mikk Mae, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Tanel ja kanad
programme.desc: Julude eel on Saaremaa mahekanapidaja Tanel vtnud sihiks leida oma kohvikusse Srvemaa traditsioonilised saiaretseptid. See teekond avardab silmaringi, petades markama kogukonna ja traditsioonide olulisust. Ole sa sugavate juurtega kohalik vi sisserandaja - puhademeeleolus kohvik ja pikkade traditsioonidega saiad toovad juluks kogukonna kokku.

programme.title: Julud ETVga
programme.desc: Sudantsoojendav juluhtu, mida juhivad Piret Jarvis-Milder ja Juhan Kilumets. Vaatajani juavad kaunid laulud, ullatuslikud kulalised, maitsed ja meenutused juludest.

programme.title: he pere muusika
programme.desc: Haide Mannamaed ja Toomas Trossi tunneme eelkige klounide Piibu ning Tuuduna. Ent nende endi ja kogu pere tegemised on ikka seotud teatri ning muusikaga. Saatejuht Reet Linna, reissoor Maarika Lauri, toimetaja Marika Kaasik, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Maailmas kuulsust kogunud artist ja muusik Kerli Kiv leiab rahu ning vaikust Eestimaa metsade keskel. Kuulsus vasitab. Kui kostuum on seljast vetud, saab lavade kuningannast lihtne naine, kes armastab loodust ja loomi. Osoonil on harukordne vimalus piiluda Kerli argiellu. Autor Sander Loite, reissoor Keiti Valiste, operaator Madis Reimund, helireissoor Taisto Uuslail, toimetaja-produtsent ie Arusoo.

programme.title: Esimese julupuha jumalateenistus Rakvere Karmeli kirikust
programme.desc: Esimese julupuha jumalateenistus Rakvere Karmeli kirikust

programme.title: Head inimesed
programme.desc: Maria Avdjuko dokumentaalfilm viib vaataja Hille Tanavsuu Vahiravifondi Kingitud elu igapaevasesse maailma sinna, kus lootus ei lpe ka siis, kui arstide snul pole enam midagi teha. See on sudamlik ja eluline portree inimestest, kes seisavad silmitsi raske haigusega, aga ka nendest, kes igapaevaselt abistavad: annetajad, vabatahtlikud, kogujad. Filmis raagivad patsiendid ja nende lahedased ausalt oma hirmudest, unistustest ning vitlusest elu nimel. Samal ajal saame aimu fondi ulatusest, kogutud annetustest ja sellest, kuidas uks vabatahtlik liikumine on kumne aastaga kasvanud osaks Eesti tervishoiususteemist. Head inimesed on liigutav tunnustus inimlikkusele, elujulgusele ja kaastundele. See tuletab meelde, kui habras on elu ja kui palju loeb, kui keegi ulatab abikae. Reissoor Maria Avdjuko, tootja Ugri Film O.

programme.title: Kaunimad jululaulud
programme.desc: Eesti Filharmoonia Kammerkoor on valitud maailma kumne parima koori hulka. Koos Tallinna Kammerorkestri ja Tnu Kaljustega esitavad nad Jaani kirikus imekaunist muusikat kontserdil Jul. Reissoor Erle Veber, helireissoor Kaspar Karner, produtsendid Ruth Alakula ja Karmel Killandi.

programme.title: Kirjandusministri juures. Muusika eri
programme.desc: Kirjandusminister Mart Juure kulaline on luuletaja ja proosakirjanik Kristiina Ehin.

programme.title: Saara Pius ja Toomas Uibo. Ma hljun taeva all
programme.desc: Saara Piusi ja Toomas Uibo vrratul julukontserdil klavad Vaino Uibo, Urmas Alenderi, Billy Joeli, Joni Michelli ja teiste autorite legendaarsed laulud. Reissoor Eva-Katariina Taimre.

programme.title: Helgi Sallo. Jumala puudutus
programme.desc: Vahur Kersna sisutihe vestlus Eesti labi aegade uhe anderikkaima ja sartsakaima naitlejanna-lauljannaga salvestati Helgi Sallo 80. sunnipaeva eelhtul. Reissoor Andres Lepasar, produtsent Ruth Heinmaa.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Julutunnel 2025
programme.desc: ETV heategevussaade teeb neil puhadel koostood Tartu likooli Kliinikumi lastefondiga, et vaatajate toel juaksid Eesti lasteni uusimad ravivimalused. Laste harvik- ja komplekshaiguste ravi on keeruline ja tihti kulukas, kuid paastab elusid ning pakub peredele lootust tulevikku vaadata. Televaatajad saavad algatust toetada, helistades fondi annetustelefonide numbritel: 9005025 (annetate 5 eurot); 9005100 (annetate 10 eurot); 9005500 (annetate 50 eurot), telefonioperaatorid knedelt teenustasu ei vta ning kogu summa kandub otse Lastefondile. Inimlikke lugusid ja sooja puhademuusikat vahendavad saatejuhid Margit Kilumets ja Margus Saar, reissoor on Rait Roland Veskemaa, kunstnik Ele Krusell, videolugude reissoor on Maarika Lauri, toimetaja Marit Ummelas ja produtsent Margus Saar. Seekordsest heategevusalgatusest teeme kokkuvtte erisaates 27. detsembri htul.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Rohelised niidud
programme.desc: Muusikaline lavastus Rohelised niidud on kuuekumnendatel loodud armastatud muusikutest koosnenud Eesti Raadio meeskvarteti lugu. Kvarteti laulud klasid legendaarsetes Tallinna restoranides, kus elu algas alles peale keskood; gastrollidel ule laia Nukogude Liidu, kus kvartetipoisse peeti enamasti valismaalasteks ja muidugi kikjal ule Eestimaa laululavadel ning kultuurimajades. See oli nelja andeka mehe noorusaeg tais pooraseid seiklusi, armumisi ja eneseleidmist. Lavastaja Priit Vigemast, osades Priit Vigemast, Mait Malmsten, Priit Strandberg, Kalle Sepp, Sepo Seeman, Peeter Oja, Jan Uuspld, Birgit Sarrap, Liina Tennosaar, Mart Toome, Marianne Leibur, Laura Vigemast, ansambel Vana Klaver ja revuuteatri Starlight Cabaret tantsijad.

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: Leidub muusikat ja lavarolle, mis vivad muuta elu. Millised need on ja mismoodi neid ara tunda? Plekktrummi julusaate kulaline on tanavusel Arvo Pardi sunnipaeva-aasta kontserturneel USA-s Carnegie Hallis debuteerinud ja hea vastuvtu osaliseks saanud laulja Maria Listra. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma, toimetaja Katriin Lepik, reissoor Maire Radsin, produtsent Laura-Liisa Veiler.

programme.title: Julusokk
programme.desc: Miks me astume igal aastal julude ajal ikka ja jalle uhte ning samasse ambrisse? Mida arvaksid praegustest julukommetest vanad eestlased? Humoorikaid skete kommenteerivad ja oma kogemusi jagavad pnevad saatekulalised. Saatejuht on Jarek Kasar.

programme.title: Minu naoga onu
programme.desc: Lahutusjargses masenduses muusikakriitik Hugo soovib just oma elu hakata taas ules ehitama, kui tema ukse taha ilmub ootamatult tema isa, dassmuusik Raivo. Kiusliku loomuga vanamees teatab, et ta on kohe-kohe maist teekonda lpetamas ja ootab ainsalt pojalt enda eest hoolitsemist. Kui aga meeste ellu ilmub atraktiivne psuhhoterapeut Marian, hakkavad isa ja poeg naise tahelepanu parast omavahel konkureerima. Vanal riukamehel Raivol nnestub luua ridamisi piinlikke episoode, millega Hugo romantilised plaanid ara rikkuda. Andres Maimiku ja Katrin Maimiku tragikomoodia raagib pealesunnitud lahedusest, nneotsingust ja andestamisest, pakkudes naeru labi pisarate ning pisaraid labi naeru. Osades Rain Tolk, Roman Baskin, Evelin Vigemast, Maarja Mitt, Eve Kivi, Jarek Kasar, Carmen Mikiver jt. Stsenaarium ning reii Katrin Maimik ja Andres Maimik. Tootjad Kuukulgur Film ja Kinosaurus Film.

programme.title: Julud ETVga
programme.desc: Sudantsoojendav juluhtu, mida juhivad Piret Jarvis-Milder ja Juhan Kilumets. Vaatajani juavad kaunid laulud, ullatuslikud kulalised, maitsed ja meenutused juludest.

programme.title: Suus sulav Eesti
programme.desc: Tippkokk Angelica Udekull valmistab julupuhadeks piduliku htusoogi. Tegemist on aga nii palju, et talle tulevad appi naitlejad Mari ja Mikk Jurjens, Sepo Seemann oma tipptennisistist poja Johannesega ja arhitekt Raul Vaiksoo, kelle ulesandeks saab ainulaadse piparkoogimaja tegemine. Too ei lahe ilma naeru, muusika ja viperusteta. Saatejuht Angelica Udekull, reissoor Marek Miil, toimetaja Robert Krvits, produtsent Laura Krvits.

programme.title: Uus juluvana
programme.desc: Andrus Kiviraha liigutav ja vaimukas julunaidend taiskasvanutele. Lugu hakkab hargnema hetkest, mil staaikas juluvanategija peab pensionile jaama ja ameti jargmisele plvele parandama. Kuidas auvaart teenistust edasi pidada, kui vana tegija enam hasti ei saa (viimati lasteaias juluvana tehes jai Heldur joomasena kempsus magama ja juhataja ei taha teda enam tellida) ning noor hasti ei taha, sest taksojuhist vaimeespoeg Tnis ootab paeva, mil tema autosse istuks rikas valismaalane, et bordelli sita. Osades Andrus Vaarik, Tnu Aav, Ester Pajusoo, Viire Valdma ja Anti Reinthal. Lavastaja Andrus Vaarik, reissoor Gerda Kordemets.

programme.title: Vallatud Vestid ja sbrad
programme.desc: Kodustuudios saavad oma heade sprade Ivo Linna, Birgit igemeele, Liis Lemsalu ja Mikk Tammeplluga kokku end ka Vallatuteks Vestideks nimetavad Tanel Padar, Ott Lepland ning Jalmar Vabarna. Reissoor Anna Stepanova, produtsent Lii Kuldmae, juhtoperaator Raul Priks.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Saaremaal on zoo
programme.desc: Risto tutvustab kuningpuuton Matut. Loomaaiapidajad vtavad suvise hooaja kokku ja raagivad, kui kaugele nad on oma plaanidega judnud. Valmis on saanud uued aedikud ja toimuvad ettevalmistused, sest saabumas on kaamel, kapibaara, leemurid ning lasuuraara. Mirge tutvustab enda uut spra aarat nimega Ralf ja naitab, kuhu on plaanis ehitada loodusmaja, kus nad tahavad korraldada tulevikus lastelaagreid ja tootubasid.

programme.title: Tooroobikud
programme.desc: Tavaliselt hakatakse julukaunistustega tegelema siis, kui kik suured tood on tehtud ja rahu maa peal. Samas toimetavad Ingrid ja Ragnar juba jaanuarist saadik kige julusega ja kuulavad jululaule augustis. Seekord saabki piiluda, kui suur too on Tartu Kaubamaja vi Tartu Raekoja platsi juluehtesse riietamine. Reissoor Marten Vaher, autor-toimetaja Marit Ummelas, produtsent Hannela Lippus.

programme.title: Suus sulav Eesti
programme.desc: Tippkokk Angelica Udekull jatkab imelise julusoogi valmistamist. Sel korral tulevad appi Metsatoll, psuhholoog Tiina Saar-Veelmaa, kes annab nu, kuidas julud sbralikus meeleolus mooda saata ja rappar Genka, kes mtleb kohapeal valja moodsad jululuuletused. Hrgutavad maitsed toovad ekraanile saatejuht Angelica Udekull, reissoor Marek Miil, toimetaja Robert Krvits, produtsent Laura Krvits.

programme.title: Julutunneli laulud
programme.desc: Julutunneli vaatajad toetasid 2020. aasta julupuhal Hille Tanavsuu Vahiravifondi Kingitud elu. Stuudios oli Parnu Linnaorkester ja dirigent Kaspar Mand, solistidena astusid ules Rita Ray, Birgit Sarrap, Nele-Liis Vaiksoo ning Sandra Uusberg ja Andero Ermel. Esinesid ka Hanna-Liina Vsa ja Noorkuu ning Hele Krve ja pianist Sten Heinoja. Reii Rait Roland Veskemaa ja Mikk Mae, toimetaja-produtsent Margus Saar.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Neli looduse elementi maa, hk, tuli ja vesi umbritsevad meid maailmas kikjal, kuid enamus ajast me nende olemasolu ei marka. Mned inimesed puutuvad nendega vahetumalt kokku kui teised, neid igapaevaselt kasutades ja osates nende rolli vaartustada. Neli inimest vtavad meid kaasa oma argipaevastele tegemistele, kus kogevad koostood loodusega ja jagavad oma suhet neile olulise elemendiga. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, reissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: Suure-Jaani rahvas ei maletanud, kui vaga nad armastavad vanu nostalgilisi rasvas kupsetatud moosipalle ja lihapirukaid, kuni Valve Lindla tuli Tallinnast tagasi ning hakkas kupsetama. Varske talupoepidaja teab nuud sealkandis kiki ja kike. Ta tormab paeval naaberkulla luudasid tooma, htul kooriproovi ning juab ka kolme tutre ja uheksa lapselapsega piparkooke kupsetada. Saatejuht Mari Tamm, reissoor Maarika Lauri, operaator Tanel Velli-Vallik, produtsent Kadi Katarina Priske.

programme.title: Sja varjust lavasarasse. Klassikataht Havryil
programme.desc: Klassikatahtede tanavune vitja Havryil Sydoryk leiab klaverimangust lootust ja lohutust ka kige raskematel hetkedel. Veedame erakordselt tooka ja andeka noormehega koos terve paeva ning naeme, mis on saravate etteastete taga tegelikult. Sja hakul Ukrainast pgenenud pere keerulist lugu avavad Havryili lahedased, sbrad ja petajad. Saate reissoor on Krista Luts, toimetaja Heleri All.

programme.title: Julutunnel 2025
programme.desc: ETV heategevussaade teeb neil puhadel koostood Tartu likooli Kliinikumi lastefondiga, et vaatajate toel juaksid Eesti lasteni uusimad ravivimalused. Laste harvik- ja komplekshaiguste ravi on keeruline ja tihti kulukas, kuid paastab elusid ning pakub peredele lootust tulevikku vaadata. Inimlikke lugusid ja sooja puhademuusikat vahendavad saatejuhid Margit Kilumets ja Margus Saar, reissoor on Rait Roland Veskemaa, kunstnik Ele Krusell, videolugude reissoor on Maarika Lauri, toimetaja Marit Ummelas ja produtsent Margus Saar. Seekordsest heategevusalgatusest teeme kokkuvtte erisaates 27. detsembri htul.

programme.title: Kik saab korda
programme.desc: Viime vaatajad ehedasse maailma, kus asjade parandamine on rohkem kui lihtsalt tegevus see on teline armastus ja hoolimine. Parandada saab nii omavahelisi suhteid, auklikku kampsunit kui ka tervist. Alati on lootust, kui on olemas armastus. Autor, reissoor Kaidor Kahar, toimetaja Heleri All, operaator-lavastaja Tarvo Tammeoks. Tootja Suur Pilt O.

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: On julud 1968. Kui kigi silmad on taevas, et jalgida astronautide katseid juda Kuule, on de Monica Joan kindel, et tema silmad seda ei nae. Kuid vaike Colette on otsustanud valmistada talle ullatuse, mis nunnale eluisu tagasi tooks.

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Kui kigi silmad on taevas, et jalgida astronautide katseid juda Kuule, on de Monica Joan kindel, et tema silmad seda ei nae. Kuid vaike Colette on otsustanud valmistada talle ullatuse, mis nunnale eluisu tagasi tooks.

programme.title: Prillitoos
programme.desc: Julude ajal istume filmi Julud Vigalas autori Mark Soosaarega talle olulisel trepil, kohtume Oteaal juluvana lahedase sbra Valduriga ja vaatame ule ajaloolised kuuseehted. Stuudios klab puhademuusika. Saatejuht Reet Linna, kaasautor Aivi Parijgi.

programme.title: Julusokk
programme.desc: Miks me astume igal aastal julude ajal ikka ja jalle uhte ning samasse ambrisse? Mida arvaksid praegustest julukommetest vanad eestlased? Humoorikaid skete kommenteerivad ja oma kogemusi jagavad pnevad saatekulalised. Saatejuht on Jarek Kasar.

programme.title: Rock-Hotel. Kuidas laks sul see mang
programme.desc: 1978. aasta 20. oktoobril astub Eesti Kunstiinstituudi metsikul peol esmakordselt lavale band, kes kutsub ennast rocknrolli austajate sektiks. Rock-Hotel purustab kik publikurekordid, mitu plvkonda armub Aita mooda saata oo laulu kuulates ja selle jarel tantsuprandal kikudes. Bandi esimesest peost viimaseni kulub tapselt 43 aastat ja 5 kuud. Harry Krvitsa dokfilm raagib kuidas kik algas, mis mehi selles hotellis knetab ja kas huumor, eneseiroonia ning rocknroll on veel sailinud. Autor Harry Krvits, film valmis koostoos Telia Inspira ja ERR-iga, tootja Pumpkin Production.

programme.title: Ilmsi vi unes. Ivo Uukkivi
programme.desc: Mis seob naitlejat libeda kalaga, kuidas maitseb koirohutee ja miks ilmutas end unenaos Lennart Meri? Neile ja veel paljudele teistelegi kusimustele saab vastuse Ivo Uukkivi portreesaatest, mis juab eetrisse juubilari 60. sunnipaeval.

programme.title: Kolm meest ja naine
programme.desc: Kui kokku saavad Nele-Liis Vaiksoo, Lauri Liiv, Mart Avandi ja Johan Randvere, jutustatakse alati lbusaid lugusid ning lauldakse meeleolukat muusikat. Seekord on teemaks kuulsad 90ndad, selle aja megahitid ja superstaarid. Reissoor Rene Vilbre, toimetaja Karmel Killandi, produtsent Laura-Liisa Veiler.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Kolm meest ja naine
programme.desc: Kui kokku saavad Nele-Liis Vaiksoo, Lauri Liiv, Mart Avandi ja Johan Randvere, jutustatakse alati lbusaid lugusid ning lauldakse meeleolukat muusikat. Seekord on teemaks kuulsad 1990ndad, selle aja megahitid ja superstaarid. Reissoor Rene Vilbre, toimetaja Karmel Killandi, produtsent Laura-Liisa Veiler.

programme.title: Eesti Televisioon
programme.desc: Neil paevil 90 aastat tagasi ehitas Albrecht Ansip valmis vanima sailinud kaugnagemisvastuvtuaparaadi Eestis. Aastavahetuseks 70 aastat tagasi oli Tallinna telestuudio juba 150 paeva edastanud eestikeelseid saateid 3900 televiisori omanikele. 6-osalises sarjas viib telelegend Vahur Kersna vaatajad rannakule Eesti Televisiooni ajaloo helesinise silmapiiri taha kulgevatele kuldsetele radadele. Kes tegi, mida tegi, kuidas tegi ja miks tegi? Alustame algusest. Reissoor Andres Lepasar, produtsent Ruth Heinmaa.

programme.title: Minu ETV
programme.desc: ETV 65. hooajal meenutasid endised ja praegused telestaarid kige agedamaid hetki oma karjaarist ning raagivad, mida Eesti Televisioon neile tahendab. Toimetajad Karmel Killandi ja Kai Vaartnu, reissoor lle un.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera. Ilm
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Koolis tapetakse otse videokoosoleku ajal kooli direktor, kuid enamik kahtlusaluseid olid mrva ajal otse kaameras. Jalgi ajades juavad uurijad uhe vana looni, mille juured peituvad samuti koolis.

programme.title: Elu parim nali
programme.desc: Tuntud ja armastatud eestlased raagivad, mis neid telekat vaadates kige enam naerma on ajanud. Otsime need naerma ajanud klipid ules ja naitame kigile, kes kaasa itsitada tahavad! Hea huumor garanteeritud!

programme.title: Vana daami visiit
programme.desc: Miljardarist vanaproua teeb pikkade aastate jarel visiidi oma kunagisse kodulinna. Linn on laostunud ja alla kainud. Vana daam otsustab appi tulla ja pakub linnale uhe miljardi! Vastutasuks nuab daam iglust - tapsemalt igluse taastamist linnas. Veel nuab ta selle inimese surma, kes kauges nooruses keeldus tunnistamast ennast tema lapse isaks ja kelle valetunnistuse tttu pidi daam linnast lahkuma. Kigi hammelduseks osutub selleks meheks linna aukodanik Alfred Ill. Vana daam seab ennast vrastemajas sisse ja jaab ootama... Peaosades Ita Ever ja Aarne kskula. Stsenaristid Ilmar Raag ja Roman Baskin, reissoor Roman Baskin.

programme.title: Varvimuusika
programme.desc: Varvimuusika maagiline seitsmes saade! Laval muinasjutuline Liisi Koikson ja ebamaine Laura oma bandidega. Kosmilist kiirgust mdab saatejuht Reigo Ahven. PS. Tanast saadet saab vaadata ka kolmanda silmaga.

programme.title: Suus sulav Eesti
programme.desc: Tippkokk Angelica Udekull jatkab imelise julusoogi valmistamist. Sel korral tulevad appi Metsatoll, psuhholoog Tiina Saar-Veelmaa, kes annab nu, kuidas julud sbralikus meeleolus mooda saata ja rappar Genka, kes mtleb kohapeal valja moodsad jululuuletused. Hrgutavad maitsed toovad ekraanile saatejuht Angelica Udekull, reissoor Marek Miil, toimetaja Robert Krvits, produtsent Laura Krvits.

programme.title: Georg
programme.desc: Tsielufaktidel phinev lugu eesti nimekaima ja armastatuima laulja Georg Otsa (1920-1975) saatusest, tema kunstniku- ning eraelust. Erakordse andega laulja jai maailma ooperilavadel tundmatuks. Peale Eesti tundis ja armastas teda vaid Venemaa ning Soome publik. Aeg oli selline. Nukogude susteem oli oma talentide suhtes kiivas. Film jutustab laulja loo, kneleb tema saatusest, mida vormisid keerulised ja muutlikud aastad.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri is in Barcelona for a gastronomic feast! He tries out dishes from prawn and quail tapas, to traditional Catalan specialties including veal-head stew.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: The chefs get baskets inspired by late-night cravings. In round one, the chefs must create a dish using frozen pizza, meatballs and maitake mushrooms.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert Irvine heads to Grand Rapids where a struggling Caribbean restaurants dingy dining room and bland menu are in desperate need of his magic touch.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Rachel shows how the best food can come in small packages. She serves up wraps stuffed with roasted vegetables, puff pastry parcels and pan-fried dumplings.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Rachel serves up recipes from her culinary travels. They include Irish soda bread with a French tapenade, Swedish cookies and potato croquettes with sauerkraut.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Chef Jet Tila and The Talks Amanda Kloots distract Bobby Flay as chefs Nikolaos Kaperneros and Monique Feybesse create fruity masterpieces.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Geoffrey Zakarian and Kate Bolduan break the news to chefs Zack Roth and Milena Pagn - theyve got to beat Bobby Flay!

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: After learning the latke basics, Jesse Palmer has the bakers fry up latke-inspired desserts. Then, the bakers create letterboard holiday bars.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: The competitors take their ribeye appetisers in very different directions. Plus, they incorporate a movie snack and a piece of poultry into their dishes.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Rachel digs deep into the larder to create a crab and pineapple tartare, a Mediterranean-inspired cannelloni dish, and meringue and praline kisses made without eggs.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Rachel Khoo puts her modern spin on three classic dishes. She makes a comforting onion soup with a crispy cheese and onion garnish. Then, there are peppers and tomatoes stuffed with smoky rice and a semolina pudding with a caramel crust.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh makes a meal to keep the farmers fueled and happy during the wheat harvest. Her menu includes Ham, Spinach and Potato Pizzas, Tomato Green Bean Salad with Wheat Berries and Coconut Pudding with Roasted Rhubarb.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is making a Middle Eastern feast for her college friends visiting the farm. She starts with her crispy Falafel and a creamy Homemade Labneh with Olive Oil and Zaatar, and she bakes fudgy Turkish Coffee Brownies.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: The remaining teams enter the breathtaking world of Gringotts Wizarding Bank to face off in three head-to-head battles. Hosts James and Oliver Phelps ask the bakers to create 3-foot showpieces inspired by the resplendent main hall, the network of tunnels and carts, and the underground vaults. The creations must also include at least one enchanting effect and two tasting elements, plus a surprise hidden treasure! Judges Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef are joined by Harry Potter alumnus Warwick Davis to decide the winner, and one team will be sent home.

programme.title: Alex Vs. America
programme.desc: Eric Adjepong hosts as experienced bakers and successful competitors Keya Wingfield, Melissa Yanc and Karina Rivera join forces to take down Chef Alex Guarnaschelli in a pastry battle. As the cuisines get even more difficult, Alex must use her expertise in gameplay to outthink and outcook her opponents. Stephanie Boswell and Sherry Yard judge the two rounds of competition, where the chefs have a chance to win up to $15,000, but only if they can defeat Chef Alex!

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Ree Drummond and Eddie Jackson challenge four of the finest gingerbreaders to create massive North Pole Christmas market displays out of gingerbread. Plus, these gingerbread geniuses will have to pick a festive fruit to incorporate into their cookies.

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: After learning the latke basics, Jesse Palmer has the bakers fry up latke-inspired desserts. Then, the bakers create letterboard holiday bars.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Chefs Sunny Anderson and Giada De Laurentiis join forces to take down Bobby. Will they choose an Indian expert or a Caribbean specialist for the big showdown?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Two Italian food experts go head-to-head for an opportunity to face off against Bobby Flay. Can they impress judges Christian Petroni and Carla Hall?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri unhinges his jaw for some mega-mouthful meals. In Louisville, KY, a seafood spot piles their specialities on top of waffles and he visits a BBQ food truck.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy stops in Portland, OR, and Charlotte, NC, to sample grilled cheese sandwiches with a twist, made-from-scratch sausages and specialties straight out of Switzerland.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: Hosts James and Oliver Phelps ask the nine pairs of bakers to create a 2-foot-tall magical showpiece that shares their love of Harry Potter. Judges Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef decide which bakers board the Hogwarts Express train to the next challenge!

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Rachel Khoo gives her culinary tips and for creating amazing food at home. She prepares a dark chocolate pudding, roast chicken parcels and a spring salad.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Rachel Khoo shares her favorite recipes that she loves to cook in her own kitchen. She creates a speedy lentil dal with homemade flatbread and a fresh pesto. For dessert, a delicious peach-ripple ice cream requires just three ingredients.

programme.title: Bakeaway Camp With Martha Stewart
programme.desc: The five remaining campers have to incorporate both sweet and savory ingredients in their desserts for the first challenge. Then they have two hours to make their most beautifully decorated pie and impress Camp Director Martha Stewart.
